articles.title: Rohit Sharma Opens Up On Team India`s Playing 11 For Pakistan Match In Asia Cup - Zee News
articles.description: Ishan Kishan Set To Replace KL Rahul All sorts of combinations available looking at how game was played yesterday. We have got experience in our batting lineup. Batters have to play accordingly. We will try to take game on but it is imoortant to read the situ…
articles.content: India captain Rohit Sharma feels the fitness tests have been done and the Men in Blue have come to Sri Lanka with their game face on and wanting to win the Asia Cup. Rohit was answering the question … [+2274 chars]
